mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_AUTH (UID, PASSWORD, SOCIAL_YN, ACCESS_TOKEN, REFRESH_TOKEN, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME) VALUES (#{uid}, #{password}, #{socialYN}, #{accessToken}, #{refreshToken}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO USER_INFO (UID, NICKNAME, INTRODUCE, AVATAR_URL, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME) VALUES (#{uid}, #{nickName}, #{introduce}, #{avatarUrl}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO USER_CATEGORY (UID, CATEGORY_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME) VALUES (#{uid}, #{categoryId}, NOW(), NOW())
